## RouteValidatorFullConfig type

Route validations config and options merged into one object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RouteValidatorFullConfig<P, Q, B> = RouteValidatorConfig<P, Q, B> & RouteValidatorOptions;
```
